com.mingsoft.bbs.action.web

类 ForumAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mingsoft.base.action.BaseAction
      • com.mingsoft.bbs.action.web.ForumAction

  • @Controller(value="bbsWebForum")
@RequestMapping(value="/mbbs/forum")
public class ForumAction
extends com.mingsoft.base.action.BaseAction
    mbbs供前端页面对板块的数据
    版本:
    版本号：
    创建日期：@date 2015年03月26日

      void getByForumId(int categoryId, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      通过categoryId查询category实体并以json的形式给前端
      void list(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      板块在前端页面列表显示 返回
      [
      {
      "categoryDateTime": "2015-07-26 10:07:12",
      "categoryDescription": "板块描述",
      "categoryId": 板块编号,
      "categorySmallImg": "板块缩略图",
      "categorySort": 板块排序,
      "categoryTitle": "板块标题"
      }
      ]

        @RequestMapping(value="/list",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public void list(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        板块在前端页面列表显示
        返回

        [
        {
        "categoryDateTime": "2015-07-26 10:07:12",
        "categoryDescription": "板块描述",
        "categoryId": 板块编号,
        "categorySmallImg": "板块缩略图",

      • getByForumId

        @RequestMapping(value="/{categoryId}/getByForumId")
public void getByForumId(@PathVariable
                               int categoryId,
                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        通过categoryId查询category实体并以json的形式给前端
        参数:
        categoryId - 版块id
        返回

        {
        "categoryDateTime": "2015-07-26 10:07:12",
        "categoryDescription": "板块描述",
        "categoryId": 板块编号,
        "categorySmallImg": "板块缩略图",
        "categorySort": 板块排序,
        "categoryTitle": "板块标题"
        }
